content: @Kyle Miller, it seems we haven't reached a consensus on the name. Could we merge as is so that I can move forward? We can always rename later if people care to.

Yeah, there was no clear preferred name; two_pointed might be marginally better, but not so much better that you should have to change anything. Thanks for waiting.

(For reference: https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/113488-general/topic/Name.20for.20a.20pair.20of.20distinct.20points.3F/near/269881837)
